Video call with Sadhguru

for January event volunteers

 

Dear {{FIRST_NAME}},

We have only 25 days remaining before we experience the presence of Sadhguru in Singapore on 22nd January. As with any Isha event, big or small, it is the volunteers that contribute in making the event happen. Due to the scale of the upcoming January event, we encourage as many people as possible to volunteer.

It is not necessary to book seats for the event if you want to volunteer. However, if you have already booked seats, you can still volunteer.

If you want to volunteer for this event, we urge you to finish your volunteer registration by 2nd January by clicking below.
Register for Volunteering
Call with Sadhguru for volunteers

Sadhguru will be speaking to all the event volunteers through a call on 3rd January. More details will be sent soon to all the volunteers!

Festive offer - closes on 10th January

Please note that festive offer for Meet, Mingle, and Meditate event will be closing soon on 10th January. Please spread the word to all whom you know so that they can avail of this opportunity.
